message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to you. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $950000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above your new offer. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still a bit above my offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $885000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
